item.title: testdeep.T
item.description: Constructing *testdeep.T import ( "testing" "github.com/maxatome/go-testdeep" ) func TestMyFunc(tt *testing.T) { t := testdeep.NewT(tt) t.Cmp(MyFunc(), 12) } func NewT(t TestingFT, config ...ContextConfig) *T Configuring *testdeep.T func TestMyFunc(tt *testing.T) { t := testdeep.NewT(tt).UseEqual().RootName("RECORD") ... } func (t *T) BeLax(enable ...bool) *T func (t *T) FailureIsFatal(enable ...bool) *T func (t *T) RootName(rootName string) *T func (t *T) UseEqual(enable ...bool) *T Main methods of *testdeep.T import ( "testing" "github.
